response.message: Jeff - any update on what the StackOverflow Podcast - what's going to happen with that / when will the new format be revealed?
Why there is no wiki for working and ultimately having transcript of this podcast?

Maybe if you blogged a little more frequently you wouldn't have so much "pent-up podcast monologue"?

Ditch the pre-retirement Spolsky blogging schedule.  ;)

I really miss the podcast. If Joel doesn't want to continue with it, there are now plenty of other valued associates that can continue in his place. I, for one, would like to hear from the new hires, what they're working on, etc.

It would be great to have a new-hire podcast.  I'd like to hear from Robert, Sam, Marc, Benjamin as well as the New York team, and any other new hire that I missed.  It would be cool to hear from the people that used the site frequently and are now working on/for it.

(As I made that list I realized that you have hired lots of people)
